name: SORROW (Redead-ITA)
description:
Long time ago, The Guardians of the Universe were fighting a great war against Monsters that threaten the universe by eating it from the inside, Today this war is won... by the Monsters.

SORROW is a small FPS Game made in GZDoom

Story:
You are a Guardian of the universe, you, along with your comrades,
have fought monstrosities that are trying to devour said universe from the inside,
Not too long ago you had a battle that costed you all of your brothers in arms, Now it's just you, your weapon, the monstrosities and your will to survive.

Controlls are:
W,A,S,D for movement 
Mouse movement for aiming and left click for firing

NOTE FOR VIDEO MAKERS: The music in this game is protected under the CC3.0, as such, if you want your video to be monetized you have to mute the music.
For FOV/Resolution and or more, Look on the option search of the option menu
